home.title: Integrated automated system for collecting and communicating information on the state of GNSS to aviation users (CAS-SIDM).
home.text_1: The purpose of CAS CIDM is to inform the users of the airspace about the system for monitoring the state of GNSS navigation service and its characteristics when flying in the airspace of the Russian Federation.
home.text_2: Information on the availability of the RAIM function in the areas of aerodromes and on the ATS routes, on the status of local control and correction stations located at aerodromes, and the accuracy of signals for different stages of flight is available to users.
home.text_3: The list and description of the elements of the global navigation satellite system (GNSS) providing navigation services in the airspace of the Russian Federation on the routes in the areas of aerodromes when carrying out inaccurate (NPA) and precise (GLS) approaches are presented in subsection ENR 4.1.4 «Global Navigation Satellite System (GNSS)» and subsections AD 2.19 «Radio navigation aids and landing equipment» of the respective aerodromes.

raim.title: RAIM Forecast
raim.textAir: Allows you to evaluate the availability of the RAIM function for the selected aerodrome
raim.textRoute: Evaluation of the availability of the RAIM function on a given route
raim.textRf: This function allows you to assess the availability of RAIM in the airspace of the Russian Federation

agreement.title: Agreement
agreement.subtitle: You must accept the terms to log in
agreement.text_p_1: The user agrees that the Rightholder of this computer information system/database (hereinafter - KIS/BD, System, Program) is FSUE «state ATM Corporation» (hereinafter – the Company), with the authorship of FSUE «state ATM Corporation» and the developer of KIS/BD LLC «NPPF Spectrum» (hereinafter – Developer), used algorithms, applied ideas, documentation and other related information contained in the KIS/BD, are intellectual property and/or trade secrets of the Company and the Developer, and are protected in accordance with the civil and criminal legislation of the Russian Federation. The user's use of this KIS/BD does not give Him any rights to intellectual property in the KIS/BD and the acquisition of any rights to it, except those specifically provided in this Agreement.
agreement.text_p_2: Except in those cases where in this Agreement otherwise specified, the User has no right to transfer and assign any of the rights granted to it under this Agreement or any related obligation.
agreement.text_p_3: The user has no right to carry out any unauthorized access or use of the KIS/BD, including but not limited to the following:
text_ul: allow the use of KIS/BD by persons not entitled to such use;
disassemble (analyze and investigate the program code);
decompile (convert program code into source code), adapt and modify  KIS/BD;

perform any other unauthorized actions regarding the KIS/BD, including its modification, translation, engineering, redesign, violating Russian and international norms on copyright and related rights when using the KIS/BD.
agreement.text_p_4: The user agrees that his actions that have led or may lead to technical failures in the operation of the CIS/database are the basis for bringing him to responsibility in accordance with the legislation of the Russian Federation, and the User is obliged to reimburse the costs of restoring the normal operation of the KIS/BD.
agreement.text_p_5: The user agrees that the use of the KIS/BD will be monitored by the Enterprise and the Developer for the proper use of the System. In this regard, the further use of the KIS/BD implies the user's consent to monitoring the use of the Program and the terms of its use. Otherwise, in case of disagreement with the terms of the Agreement, the User is obliged to stop using the KIS/BD and «log out».
